ping() - Method in interface it.polimi.ingsw.CommunicationProtocol.RMI.ServerRemoteInterfaces.ClientHandlerRemoteInterface
Used by the client to ping the client handler, indicating that it (the client) is still connected.
This method is used as an implementation of a heartbeat mechanism.

place(Card, int, boolean) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Player.CardMap
Method which places the card in cardsPlaced map, updates resources and items of the player, updates covered corners of nearby cards, updates the list of coordinates placed, calls the method to update the available placements and returns the points gained by the player by placing this card.

The PlacedCardView class represents a component responsible for displaying the details of a card that has been placed in the game, including its artifact type and the visibility status of its corners in the TUI.

PlaceStarterCard - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Logic.States.Implementations
Represents the initial setup state in the game, where players receive their starting cards and choose their colors.
This state implements the GameState interface and handles starter card distribution and placement, initial card draws and player color selection.

Player - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Player

playerReadiness - Variable in class it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Logic.States.ASynchronousGameState
Map that keeps track of which players have completed the setups of this game phase and which haven't.
If true, it means the player HAS completed all setups and is ready for the next phase.

PlayerSwitcher - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Logic.States.PlayerSwitchers
Abstract class for managing the order of player turns in a game.
Concrete implementations should define the logic for determining the first player and the next player in the sequence.

PlayerSwitcherNonResilient - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Logic.States.PlayerSwitchers
Implementation of PlayerSwitcher that does not consider whether players are online or offline.
This player switcher simply iterates over the list of players in order.
PlayerSwitcherNonResilient(List<Player>) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Logic.States.PlayerSwitchers.PlayerSwitcherNonResilient
 
PlayerSwitcherResilient - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Logic.States.PlayerSwitchers
Implementation of PlayerSwitcher that considers the connection status of players.
This player switcher ensures that only online players are selected for turns.
